mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.category_id AS "category.id", c.name AS "category.name", c.logo AS "category.logo", a.logo AS "logo", a.description AS "description", a.openid AS "openid", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_item_category c ON c.id = a.category_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_rank( id, name, category_id, logo, description, openid, nickname, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{category.id}, #{logo}, #{description}, #{openid}, #{nickname}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_rank SET name = #{name}, category_id = #{category.id}, logo = #{logo}, description = #{description}, openid = #{openid}, nickname = #{nickname}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
